Header: Pre-School Students Visit Newly Inaugurated Jaffna International Airport
Content: Security Forces Headquarters - Jaffna, facilitated one more visit of the pre-school students to Jaffna International Airport on Friday (18). A total of 48 students of 'Kannakai' pre-school and 'Thivya' Pre-School in Jaffna at Earlalai, accordingly visited the airport premises along with their teachers and parents to have a lifetime experience. Commander Security Forces - Jaffna, Major General Ruwan Wanigasooriya gave his approval to the project in response to their request.
